text: Jericho is a very old city in the West Bank/Judaeo-Samaria. It is mentioned in the Book of Joshua. In 2007 18,346 people lived there. The City is a home to Jericho Synagogue, amongst the only Synagogues that are owned by the State of Palestina and one of the most ancient mainstream Jewish-Synagogues in the world. ==References== ==Other websites== *Bible places Category:Cities in the West Bank Category:Old Testament Category:Ancient Israeli settlements
title: Jericho
